<h2 align="center">ğŸš€ A workspace in motion</h2>

This isn't a traditional desktop. It is a highly opinionated
environment built around my own workflow, frequently disregarding
standard conventions in favor of personal efficiency and aesthetics.
Think of it less as a finished product and more as a constantly
evolving project alongside my shifting needs.

That said, you are more than welcome to explore and cherry-pick whatever you
find useful.Whether itâ€™s a single alias or a full configuration
block, feel free to make it yours!

<h2 align="center">ğŸ» Contribution</h2>

This setup is tailored for my personal use, so there might be some
hidden quirks Iâ€™ve missed. Bug fixes and docs polish are always appreciated!
If youâ€™re thinking about adding a new feature, letâ€™s chat about it in
an [issue](https://github.com/envyj020/dotfiles/issues) first to ensure
it aligns with the project direction.
